name: iTec Web Solutions
tagline: Wordpress Web Design & Marketing | Small Business
description:
iTec specializes in Wordpress web design and marketing solutions for small to medium businesses.  We are a full service, results-oriented web development company that strives to help businesses increase Sales & Conversions through a strong online presence. 
Start with trust: we are a BBB ACCREDITED business focused on outstanding results and customer support. Our entire web design process is geared towards helping businesses grow and find customers online. We strive to build websites that are high ranking and conversion optimized so your business can succeed.
